categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems aquatic vehicles

nodes.text: Trade Federation Patrol Boats were boats used by the Trade Federation in the many lakes, rivers, and seas of Naboo during the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY. They had a crew of two B1-Series battle droids and were armed with one laser cannon. A flotilla were used to patrol a prison camp on the Solleu River; they failed to interdict three Naboo Resistance rescue ships from escaping with the prisoners.
Trade Federation Patrol Boats appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter.
